page.title: 07MY SCHOOL DAY
page.content: Scottish braves. I found it very interesting. After that we went back into our own classroom. Me, Jeffrey, Yasmin, Tracey, and Helen go into Mr. Heath's classroom for our maths lesson. Me, Megan, Sarah and Helen work together. We do lots of maths. It is playtime. I go back into class two. I put my equipment back in my desk and I go out to play. We have fifteen minutes play. We play copshop and running races. It is good fun when playtime is over, we go in. It is Mrs. Eno's music lesson. We sing lots of songs, it is good fun. After that Mrs. Eno reads us a story about Mr. & Mrs. Twit. When she finishes the story it is dinner time. We go outside to go to the toilet and wash our hands. After that we come in and have our lunch. After lunch we go out to play, we play copshop again. When play is over we go
